name: MedicationOverview SourceOrganization
title: Medicaton Overview Source Organization
description: Extension to capture the organization that was the author/source of a List. This extends the current possible reference types (Practitioner | Patient | Device) so that it includes an Organization.
purpose: In some cases an organization can be the source / author of a List. For example, in the informationstandard Medication Process, an organization is responsible and the author of an Medication Overview. This extension allows to reference to an Organization resource to provide information on the source / author of a List.
